#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    int x;
    cin >> x;
    while(x--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        int ave = 0;
        int arr[10] = {0};
        int arr1[10] = {0};

        int val = a.length();
        int val1 = b.length();
        for(int x = 0; x < val; x++)
            arr[a[x]-'0']++;
        for(int x = 0; x < val1; x++)
            arr1[b[x]-'0']++;
        int num = 10;
        
        for(int x = 0; x < 10; x++)
        {
            if(arr[x] == arr1[x])
            num--;
        }

        if(!num)
        cout << "1\n";
        else
            cout << "0\n";

    }
  return 0;
}
